description: The collection of event source templates
title: Event source templates

___name.description: A name to identify the event source template

___key.description: Unique key generated by the server to be used in events.

___configuration.description: Providing a schema aims to help the WUI for configuration.

___token.description: JSON Web Token to be authenticated when contacting the configuration URL.

___organizationId.description: The organization that offer the event source template.

___public.description: Make the event source template available to everybody.

___configurationUi.description: Provide the configuration for the dynamic UI.

___schemaForm.description: Valid form schema accordingly to: http://schemaform.io

___id.description: Unique identifier given by the server
